name: Slices•
description:
Slices is a fast paced juicy arcade gameplay where you aim to slice the fruits by shooting the blades.
Throw the ninja style blades and slice the different versatile fruits. Be careful and don’t destroy the bombers. Stay focused and slash all the fruits

How to play
• Tap to throw the blades and slice the fruits
• Score points

Make sure you don’t play during work, it’s highly addictive. Give it a try
